clips.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<rss version="2.0" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
<channel>
  <title>
  	${:Title of RSS feed}
  </title>
  <description>
  	${:RSS feed description}
  </description>
  <link>
  	${:Link to page RSS is for}
  </link>
  <lastBuildDate>
	${:Date of the latest item in the feed}
  </lastBuildDate>
  <ttl>
  	${:Integer minutes feed can stay cached before refreshing}
  </ttl>
<atom:link href="${:URL of this XML file when online}" rel="self" type="application/rss+xml" />
</channel>
</rss>
clips.name: RSS Feed
